long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Anomi is a lead generation tool designed for for sales, marketing and recruitment professionals.

Anomi converts any Linkedin Sales Navigator search into a list of verified emails so you can connect with the relevant prospects faster!

Learn more at www.anomi.io
